title: (x) Let's Build Something Together™ tech sans - DIN 1451 Mittelschrift {Florian Hardwig, Jan E}
content:
Need to know what this font is ASAP! Can anyone help me PLEASE!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228014329im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/LowesType_4408.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Matrix logo techno sans - FF Max {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228014329/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34454 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Fresh 'n' Fruityloves you" techno font - Luvbug {Gary Schmidt} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228014329/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34453 "Go to next forum topic")
author: MFA

comments.content:
[FF DIN at FontShop USA](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228014329/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=FF%20DIN)  
... and by “narrowed” Jan means [squooshed](http://web.archive.org/web/20071228014329/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/squooshed).

Squooshed. Yes. This word just keeps slipping my mind.  
Thanks, Stephen.
